summary: An heiress switches places with her secretary in order to find a man who will love her for who she is and not for her money.
cast: Miriam Hopkins|Joel McCrea|Fay Wray|Henry Stephenson|Reginald Denny|Beryl Mercer|George Meeker|Wade Boteler|Herbert Bunston|Burr McIntosh|Edgar Norton|Charles Coleman|Brooks Benedict|Harry Bowen|William Burgess|Edward Cooper|Bess Flowers|Dick Gordon|William Gould|Fred Howard|Olaf Hytten|Selmer Jackson|Mike Lally|John Marshall|Harold Miller|Buddy Roosevelt|Dale Van Sickel
keywords: screwball comedy|reference to the titanic|baby picture|reporter|celebrity
title: La venus de oro
